name: PM-Kisan (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi)
description: Direct income support to small and marginal farmer families to supplement their financial needs.
ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
benefits: Periodic direct benefit transfers to eligible farmer families
eligibility: Land-holding farmer families (subject to scheme rules and exclusions)
notes: One of the flagship income support schemes for farmers.

name: PMFBY (Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana)
description: Crop insurance scheme providing coverage and financial support to farmers suffering crop loss or damage from natural calamities, pests, and diseases.
ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
benefits: Compensation/claims for crop losses to insured farmers
eligibility: Farmers growing notified crops in notified areas (per scheme guidelines)
notes: Operates through empanelled insurance companies; premium rates and coverage depend on crop/season.

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
description: Provides farmers with timely access to credit for crop production, equipment purchases and allied agricultural activities.
ministry: Ministry of Finance / NABARD (implementation by banks)
benefits: Short-term and medium-term loans at concessional rates, working capital support
eligibility: Farmers with land records; as permitted banks may cover tenant farmers and others
notes: Widely used channel for agricultural credit and subsidies.

name: e-NAM (National Agriculture Market)
description: An online trading platform that connects mandi yards across India for transparent pricing and better market access.
ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
benefits: Better price discovery, pan-India buyer access, transparent auctioning
notes: Promotes market integration and competitive pricing for agricultural produce.

name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund
description: Provides financial assistance for development of post-harvest infrastructure, storage, and value chain projects.
ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
benefits: Credit-linked support/loans and incentives for infrastructure projects
eligibility: Farmers, Farmer Producer Organizations (FPOs), agri-entrepreneurs, startups and others
notes: Encourages investment in agri-infrastructure to reduce post-harvest losses.

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
description: Scheme to boost agricultural productivity and farmer incomes through state-level projects, grants and innovations.
ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
benefits: Grants for state-level agri-projects, infrastructure and innovation interventions
eligibility: State implementing agencies and beneficiaries under state projects
notes: Supports state-driven interventions to increase agriculture production.

name: Soil Health Card (SHC) Scheme
description: Provides farmers with soil test reports and recommendations on fertilizer and nutrient application.
ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
benefits: Soil nutrient status, crop-wise fertilizer advice, improved input-use efficiency
eligibility: Farmers submitting soil samples for testing
notes: Aimed at improving productivity and reducing excess fertilizer use.

name: PM Kisan MaanDhan Yojana (PM-KMY)
description: Pension scheme for small and marginal farmers providing post-retirement income support.
ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare / Ministry of Labour
benefits: Monthly pension upon attaining specified age (subject to contributions and rules)
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers who meet age and contribution criteria
notes: Social security measure for elderly small/marginal farmers.
